content.html: I'm really disappointed in the secrecy around recent COVID outbreaks within tech community events. We should be better than this. Spread can and will happen. But you owe it to people to disclose it so they can prevent further spread!
content.value:
I'm really disappointed in the secrecy around recent COVID outbreaks within tech community events.

We should be better than this.

Spread can and will happen. But you owe it to people to disclose it so they can prevent further spread!
